code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

representedOrganization.name: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:28 yr old white f vicar complains of moderate abdominal pain and Stomach. NKDA. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 62.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered Reticulocyte Count.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:30 yo white F vicar presents with 7 days history of moderate abdominal pain. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 65.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:a white f aged 30 years says she is having symptoms of moderate abdominal pain 9 x week, mostly during the day. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 63.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Reticulocyte Count.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
